sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { resetCount } from "../store/reducers/cartReducer"; import { useSelector } from "react-redux"; export default function Invoice() { const [invoices, setInvoices] = useState([]); const [products, setProducts] = useState([]); const [carts, setCarts] = useState([]); const [customers, setCustomers] = useState([]); const months = [ "Jan", "Feb", "Mar", "Apr", "May", "Jun", "Jul", "Aug", "Sep", "Oct", "Nov", "Dec", ]; const currentDate = new Date(); const day = currentDate.getDate(); const monthIndex = currentDate.getMonth(); const year = currentDate.getFullYear(); function getDayWithSuffix(day) { if (day >= 11 && day <= 13) { return day + "th"; } switch (day % 10) { case 1: return day + "st"; case 2: return day + "nd"; case 3: return day + "rd"; default: return day + "th"; } } const formattedDate = `${getDayWithSuffix(day)} ${ months[monthIndex] } ${year}`; console.log(formattedDate); // Output: "1st Sept 2023" const cust_Id = useSelector((state) => { return state.user.cust_Id; }); useEffect(() => { console.log(cust_Id); // Fetch data from both endpoints simultaneously Promise.all([ fetch("http://localhost:8080/api/invoicesByCust_Id/" + cust_Id).then( (r) => r.json() ), fetch("http://localhost:8080/api/getProductsByCartDto/" + cust_Id).then( (res) => res.json() ), fetch("http://localhost:8080/api/getCartByCust_Id/" + cust_Id).then( (res) => res.json() ), fetch("http://localhost:8080/api/getCustomer/" + cust_Id).then((res) => res.json() ), ]) .then(([invoicesData, productsData, cartsData, customersData]) => { setInvoices(invoicesData); setProducts(productsData); setCarts(cartsData); setCustomers(customersData); }) .catch((error) => { console.error("Error fetching data:", error); }); console.log(invoices); console.log(products); console.log(carts); console.log(customers); }, []); return (

Invoice #DS0204{" "} Paid

E_Mart.com

Hello {customers.cust_Name}

{customers.addLine1},

{customers.addLine2}, {customers.pincode}

{" "} {customers.email}

{customers.phone_No}

Billed To:
Preston Miller

4068 Post Avenue Newfolden, MN 56738

PrestonMiller@armyspy.com

001-234-5678

Invoice No:

#DZ0112

Invoice Date:

{formattedDate}

Order No:

#1123456

Order Summary
{products.map((pro) => ( ))}
No. Item Price Quantity Total
01
{pro.prodName}

{pro.prodName}

 $ {pro.mrpPrice} 1 $ {pro.cardholdersPrice}
Sub Total $ {carts.total}
Discount : - $ {carts.discount}.50
Delivery Charge : - $ {carts.delivery_Charges}
Tax $ 12.00
Total

$ {carts.price}
Send
); }
